WindowMozInnerScreenY.summary:
The mozInnerScreenY property of the interface returns the Y coordinate of the top-left corner of the window's viewport, in screen
coordinates.

blockquote.para: This coordinate is reported in CSS pixels, not in hardware pixels.

WindowMozInnerScreenY.value: The window.mozInnerScreenY property is a floating point, read-only value; it has no default value.
